activities: Sela2, doing business as Qforma, provides process, software and services to help marketing, medical, executive and alliance management teams across the global life sciences industry to optimally leverage internal and public information to better execute in the marketplace and build stronger relationships with their customers. In the course of their business Qforma, SELA2 receives and processes data transferred from clients and Qforma offices with the EEA containing personal data that may be linked to an individual, either collected directly from the individual by the Qforma client or that has been collected either directly from the individual or from publicly available sources.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
